sources.title: Lone Star Deception (2019) Crime, Drama | with Eric Roberts | Directed by Don Okolo
sources.description:
Stuart Sagle (Gary Lee Mahmoud) is poised to win the race for Governor of Texas until a scandal threatens to destroy his campaign. His uncle Bill Sagle (Eric Roberts) hatches a risky plan, throwing Tim Bayh (Anthony Ray Parker) into the spotlight as Texas' first Black candidate for Governor. Thrust into a dangerous game, Tim faces relentless threats, personal turmoil, and cutthroat politics, pushing him to either seize the moment, defy the odds, or go down fighting.

Original title: Lone Star Deception 

Director: Don Okolo
Writers: Ed DeZevallos, Don Okolo
Main Actors:  Eric Roberts, Anthony Ray Parker, Gary Lee Mahmoud 
Genres: Crime, Drama, Political


00:00 – Full Movie with subtitles
01:15 – Stuart Sagle launches his gubernatorial campaign with a rousing speech.
15:30 – Stuart's affair with a prostitute surfaces, jeopardizing his political aspirations.
30:45 – Bill Sagle convinces Tim Bayh to run as Texas' first Black gubernatorial candidate.
45:50 – Tim Bayh faces an assassination attempt during a public rally.
1:01:15 – Tim confronts Bill Sagle about the true motives behind his candidacy.
1:16:20 – Tim grapples with personal demons, questioning his role in the campaign.
1:31:25 – Tim delivers a powerful debate performance, swaying public opinion.
1:42:00 – Election results are announced, culminating in a surprising outcome.


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbtxZGahjOpER2huEhTG9Rb

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Stuart Sagle is leading in the race for Governor of Texas, but a fling with a prostitute threatens to derail his campaign. His biggest supporter, his uncle Bill Sagle, has a plan that puts a second candidate, Tim Bayh, into play, and Tim finds himself as the first Black candidate for Governor in Texas' history. Thrust into circumstances he neither understands nor controls, Tim weaves his way past assassination attempts, and faces his own demons as he has to decide to quit the race, ride a wave to the statehouse, or die trying.
metadata.Actors: Eric Roberts, Anthony Ray Parker, Gary Lee Mahmoud
